resources.string:
Hello, I'm Abhishek Yadav, a student at the Institute of Professional Studies (IIPS), Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya (DAVV) in Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India, pursuing a 5-year Integrated Master of Computer Applications (MCA) program.
I have a strong interest in programming and software development, with proficiency in languages such as C++, Java, and Kotlin. 

To document and share my learning journey, I've created several repositories on GitHub: 
1. CPP-Language: A repository tracking my progress in learning C++. 
2. JavaByABHI: This repository showcases my exploration of Java, covering topics from basics to advanced concepts. 
3. Dice_Roller: A Kotlin-based application simulating a dice roll, reflecting my interest in mobile app development. 

Beyond academics, I engage with the broader tech community through platforms like LeetCode, where I tackle coding challenges to enhance my problem-solving skills. In my leisure time, I enjoy gaming and connect with fellow enthusiasts on platforms such as Steam and Discord. Feel free to explore my projects on GitHub or connect with me on LinkedIn.
